channel.title: Ubiquiti on Sam Stelfox
channel.description: Recent content in Ubiquiti on Sam Stelfox

item.title: Setting Up EdgeRouter PoE on Google Fiber
item.description: I recently moved to an area with Google Fiber and jumped on the chance to have a cheap and fast connection, and I didn’t need to sell my soul to certain other companies. I already owned a Ubiquiti EdgeRouter PoE 5 which has been battle tested at easily routing a gigabit worth of small packets. When setting up my service, the representative I talked to told me I was able to use my own router, but I would still need to get a Google Fiber Network Box.
